name: Sabrina, Mind Reader of the Lightsworn
text: 1 "Lightsworn" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters/nIf this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the end of this turn, also it cannot be used as Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Material this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: Target 1 "Lightsworn" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if you send a "Lightsworn" monster, Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. During your End Phase, send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Sabrina, Mind Reader of the Lightsworn" once per turn.
